answers.answer: Wow! We have something in common. I am 40 weeks +2 days. I have gestational diabetes. I was gonna be induced, but my Dr says it's too dangerous and my baby is too big. Not to mention my cervix wasn't ripe or dilated. So I have a scheduled c-section set for Wednesday.
Ohh it's stressful knowing... I wish I would have just went into labor on my own. Best wishes and speedy recovery to you and your c section! We are so close to seeing our Littles for the first time!!

question: Guhhhh, 40 weeks and getting induced for gestational hypertension :( and to make things more stressful I am not dilated nor is my cervix "ripe" so the inducing me is going to take longer ;( I was hoping so bad to have a natural birth and I am slowly losing hope... Have any of you ladies been induced and still managed not to have any pain medication?
title: getting induced tomorrow night
